column1: The COVID-19 may exacerbate anxiety and psychosis-like symptoms as well as lead to non-specific mental issues. We urge our colleagues to spread sound infection control practices and help their communities maintain civil discourse https://www.psychiatrictimes.com/psychiatrists-beware-impact-coronavirus-pandemics-mental-health #coronavirus #COVID19
Much of the emerging information about #COVID19 concerns the general population. A new study in @TheLancet examines the impact of the #coronavirus on a group of #pregnant women.
